name: Jam Above Jam Below
description:
Join Witz and Doobz on their adventure to make a video game in just a week! With seven different mini-games, you'll have plenty of fun as you try to win the game jam and save the day!

You'll jump, run, bike, puzzle, and even date your way to success, as fully-voiced cartoon cutscenes bring the fast-paced story to life. Primarily an action platformer with some puzzle, rhythm, and dating sim elements, the total expected playtime is about 20 to 30 minutes. This game is made for all ages!

Truly a jam within a jam, this game was made in a week by me, Kimberly Blais of Mama Makes Games, for the 2022 Epic MegaJam using Unreal Engine 5. Following the theme of "As Above, So Below," this recursive game about making a game playfully explores the joys and challenges of doing a game jam.
